common.privacyNotice: All API keys and data are stored only in your local browser to ensure privacy and security. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions, please feel free to contact us through our community or feedback page.
common.bigNotice: When importing large files, your browser may become unresponsive. It is recommended to optimize large files.
common.dragAndDropText: Click or drag files here to upload (supports TXT, MD, JSON, and other text formats)
common.pasteUploadContent: Or directly paste text content here
common.noTargetLanguage: Please select at least one target language
common.singleFileModeTooltip: When selected, only one file can be uploaded; a new file will automatically replace the current one
common.largeModeTooltip: For large files, enabling this option will hide the source preview to prevent performance issues caused by loading massive data
common.directExportTooltip: Automatically export the file after translation without showing a preview
common.useCacheTooltip: When enabled, previous translation records will be used to speed up the translation process
common.contextAwareTranslationTooltip: When enabled, AI will use context for translation, improving dialogue coherence and accuracy for subtitles (AI models only)
common.multiLanguageModeTooltip: Enable to translate into multiple languages simultaneously, with each result saved as a separate file
common.resetUploadTooltip: Clear manually entered content and uploaded files
common.sameLanguageTarget: Source and target languages are the same. The target language has been automatically adjusted to
common.sameLanguageSource: Source and target languages are the same. The source language has been automatically adjusted to
common.enterApiKey: Please provide an API Key or switch to the free API
common.enterLlmUrl: Please enter the LLM API URL in the 'API Settings'
common.deepLXUnavailable: The current DeepLX node is unavailable; it has been automatically switched to GTX API (Free).
common.deeplUnavailable: The current DeepL node is unavailable. Please check your API Key and configuration.
common.llmUnavailable: The current LLM node is unavailable. Please check the API URL and model name in 'API Settings'.
common.noFileUploaded: Please upload the file to be translated
common.translationComplete: Translation complete. All translated files have been automatically downloaded.
common.noSourceText: Please provide the text to be processed
common.hideResultsTooltip: Hides the results preview to prevent the page from loading large amounts of data and causing the page to lag.
common.multiValueHint: If there is more than one value, separate them by spaces.
common.importSettingTooltip: Import configuration from a local file
common.exportSettingSuccess: Configuration exported successfully! Please check your downloaded file.
common.exportSettingError: Export failed, please try again later.
common.importSettingError: Import failed, please try again later.
common.importSettingparseError: The configuration file format is incorrect or corrupted.
common.importSettingreadFileError: Failed to read the file, please try again.

json.title: Multilingual JSON Translation - i18n Internationalization & Localization Developer Assistant | JSONTranslate
json.description: JSONTranslate is a lightweight and efficient multilingual JSON translation tool designed for developers, content creators, and project managers. Leverage DeepSeek, ChatGPT, and translation APIs from Google, DeepL, and Azure to quickly convert JSON documents into multiple languages, fully supporting your internationalization and localization projects.
json.keywords: JSONTranslate, JSON translation tool, internationalization, localization, i18n, developer tool, Crowdin alternative, free translation, multilingual translation, translation API, ChatGPT, DeepSeek, Google Translate, DeepL, Azure Translate, auto translate JSON, programming language translation
json.clientDescription: JSONTranslate provides an efficient, lightweight solution for translating JSON data for developers and content creators. It supports DeepSeek, ChatGPT, and major translation APIs to help you quickly achieve project internationalization and localization. Whether you're developing a multilingual website, application, or handling multilingual datasets, JSONTranslate offers a simple solution to translate JSON file contents into multiple target languages.
json.dragAndDropText: Click or drag JSON/TXT files here to upload
json.pasteUploadContent: Upload or directly paste JSON text content here
json.i18nModeExtra: In i18n mode, the selected source language will be used as the source field (if 'auto' is selected, then 'en' will be used), and all target language translations will be added to the same object.
json.invalidJson: Unable to parse the entered JSON data. Please check if the format is correct.
json.inputOutputKeyMissing: Input and output key names cannot be empty
json.nodeCountMismatch: Mismatch in node count: the number of nodes for the input key and output key do not match, unable to perform mapping
json.keyToTranslateExtra: Specify the key name to be translated
json.multiValueHint: If there are multiple values, please separate them with commas
json.StartKeyExtra: (Optional) Specify the starting node position for translation; if left blank, translation will begin from the first node.
json.fieldToTranslateExtra: Specify the field name to be translated (supports only a single field)
json.nodeToTranslateExtra: If you use a node name directly, only the first-level child nodes will be matched.
json.keyMappingTooltip: Click to toggle node translation mode. 'Original key translation' means the input and output use the same key name, while 'mapped translation' allows conversion between different key names. For example, with original key translation, node A's value remains in A after translation; with mapped translation, it can be placed in B.

markdown.title: Markdown File Translation Tool | Free Multi-API Translation (DeepSeek, ChatGPT, LLM, etc.) | MD-translator
markdown.description: The open-source MD-translator effortlessly translates Markdown documents in bulk, supporting multiple target languages at once. It supports DeepSeek, ChatGPT, custom LLM, as well as Google, DeepL, and Azure Translate among other free translation APIs. Open-source and efficient, it facilitates multilingual content internationalization.
markdown.keywords: Markdown translation, MD translation, file translation, bulk translation, multilingual translation, free translation, DeepSeek, ChatGPT, custom LLM, Google Translate, DeepL translation, Azure translation
markdown.clientDescription: Supports single or batch translation of Markdown files. Simply upload or paste your text, select the target language, and complete the translation with one click.
markdown.dragAndDropText: Click or drag Markdown files here to upload (supports TXT, Markdown formats)
markdown.pasteUploadContent: Or directly paste Markdown text content here
markdown.tFrontmatterTooltip: If selected, the document's frontmatter (metadata/header) will also be translated
markdown.tCodeBlocksTooltip: If selected, multi-line code blocks in the document will also be translated
markdown.tLatexTooltip: If selected, translates LaTeX formulas in the document, preventing special characters (e.g. currency symbols) from being misinterpreted
markdown.rawTranslationModeTooltip: If selected, translates raw text directly without preserving original formatting. Suitable for format‑insensitive scenarios and recommended for AI translation only.

subtitle.title: Subtitle Translation Tool | Free Batch Subtitle Translation (supports srt, ass, vtt, lrc) | Subtitle Translator
subtitle.description: The open-source and free Subtitle Translator supports single or batch translation of subtitle formats .srt, .ass, .vtt, and .lrc, offering translation between over 50 languages. Leveraging multiple interfaces such as DeepSeek, ChatGPT, custom AI models, as well as Google, DeepL, and Azure Translate, it extracts and translates subtitles and lyrics with one click. It’s free and open source, aiding in multilingual video content processing.
subtitle.keywords: subtitle translation, srt translation, ass translation, vtt translation, lrc translation, multilingual subtitles, batch subtitle translation, free translation, subtitle extraction, lyrics translation, DeepSeek, ChatGPT, Google Translate, DeepL Translate, Azure Translate, DeepLX
subtitle.clientDescription: Supports single or batch translation of .srt, .ass, .vtt, and .lrc subtitle formats. Upload or paste subtitle content, select the target language, and extract and complete translation in one click.
subtitle.dragAndDropText: Click or drag and drop subtitle files here to upload (supports ASS, SRT, VTT, LRC formats)
subtitle.pasteUploadContent: Or directly paste subtitle text content here
subtitle.bilingualTooltip: If selected, both the original and translated texts will be displayed, forming bilingual subtitles
subtitle.unsupportedSub: Unsupported subtitle format. Please check the file content.
subtitle.noFileUploaded: Please upload the subtitle file to be translated
subtitle.translationComplete: Translation complete. All translated subtitle files have been automatically downloaded.
subtitle.noSourceText: Please import or paste subtitle text first
subtitle.noExtractedText: No valid subtitle text could be extracted
subtitle.bilingualError: The original subtitle format may be too complex. Please try deselecting bilingual subtitles.

text-splitter.title: Text Splitter | Free Long Text Segmentation Tool (supports character limits and sentence splitting)
text-splitter.description: An efficient text splitting tool that segments long texts by character count or complete sentences. Ideal for managing token limits for DeepSeek, ChatGPT, and other AI LLMs, as well as for document editing and social media content optimization. Supports automatic segmentation and bulk export, improving text management and copying efficiency.
text-splitter.keywords: text splitter, long text segmentation, text processing, split by characters, ChatGPT character limit, AI text processing, sentence splitting, TXT text splitter, article segmentation, bulk export text, LLM token management, text optimization
text-splitter.clientDescription: The text splitter automatically divides long texts into segments, supporting both character count and complete sentence splitting, ideal for ChatGPT, AI model inputs, document editing, and more. It also supports bulk export, enhancing text management and processing efficiency. For non-UTF-8 texts (such as French), please import via file upload; the system will automatically detect the encoding to prevent garbled text.
text-splitter.noExportableText: No exportable text detected. Please check your input and try again.
text-splitter.exportedMergedText: Merged split text has been exported.
text-splitter.checkDownloadDirectory: Please check your download directory. The split files have been successfully exported
text-splitter.setExportFileName: Set the export file name; if left blank, the original file name or a default name will be used
text-splitter.mergeText: Merge all split texts, separated by two line breaks
text-splitter.exportIndividualFiles: Bulk export each segment as a separate text file

img-prompt.title: IMGPrompt Data Generator
img-prompt.description: Designed specifically for IMGPrompt data processing, this tool allows you to generate JSON data in batches by customizing objects and attributes. It simplifies data format conversion for quick generation, editing, and copying operations.
img-prompt.keywords: IMGPrompt, JSON data generator, online JSON editor, data format conversion, batch data processing, custom object attributes, programming assistance, data management
img-prompt.clientDescription: Quickly generate the JSON data required for IMGPrompt in batches. Simply input data line by line, with each line containing a display name and its corresponding language name, separated by a tab ('\t') or a colon (':'). For example: 'Illustration: 插图' or 'sketch: 素描'. You can also customize the values for 'object' and 'attribute' in the IMGPrompt data.

flare.title: Flare Bookmark Parsing & Conversion Tool | Fast Bookmark Import and Conversion
flare.description: Use the Flare Bookmark Parsing & Conversion Tool to quickly convert bookmark data into the Flare format. Choose 'App' mode to parse application lists or 'Bookmark' mode to parse bookmark lists, and seamlessly convert between app and bookmarks data for efficient management.
flare.keywords: Flare, bookmark parsing, bookmark conversion, bookmark import, data conversion, App mode, Bookmark mode
flare.clientDescription: This tool converts bookmark data into the Flare format. You can choose 'App' mode to parse application lists or 'Bookmark' mode to parse bookmark lists, with support for bidirectional conversion between app and bookmarks data.
flare.dragAndDropText: Click or drag files here to upload (supports HTML, JSON formats)
flare.pasteUploadContent: Or directly paste bookmark data here
flare.invalidFormate: The current text format is not

json-match-update.title: JSON Data Match & Update Tool
json-match-update.description: This tool matches target JSON data with source JSON data and automatically updates the corresponding weight values. Customize field names for a simple, fast process that supports multiple data formats.
json-match-update.keywords: JSON tool, JSON data update, JSON matching tool, JSON data processing, JSON auto-update, data processing tool, JSON parsing, JSON editor
json-match-update.clientDescription: This tool compares the 'card_id' in the target data with the 'id' in the source data and updates the corresponding 'count' value to the 'weight' field in the source data.
json-match-update.originalIdField: Field name for matching in source data
json-match-update.targetIdField: Field name for matching in target data
json-match-update.originalWeightField: Field name for updating in source data
json-match-update.targetWeightField: Field name for updating in target data

json-node-edit.title: JSON Node Batch Editor
json-node-edit.description: Easily edit JSON nodes with this tool. It supports batch addition of prefixes, suffixes, or text replacement to boost data processing efficiency.
json-node-edit.keywords: JSON editor, batch JSON editing, JSON tool, add prefix/suffix, text replacement, variable editing, JSON bulk modification
json-node-edit.clientDescription: This tool allows you to batch search for specific nodes in JSON data and edit their values. You can add a prefix, suffix, or perform text replacement on the found nodes. It supports searching for multiple nodes (separated by commas, e.g., 'object,attribute') and nested key names (e.g., 'zh.title').
json-node-edit.jsonPathsTooltip: Please enter the JSON paths to search (separate multiple paths with commas)
json-node-edit.addPrefixPlaceholder: Enter the prefix to add to all matching values
json-node-edit.addSuffixPlaceholder: Enter the suffix to add to all matching values
json-node-edit.findTextPlaceholder: Enter the text to search for in the JSON nodes
json-node-edit.replaceTextPlaceholder: Enter the text to replace the found text
json-node-edit.replaceNodeValuePlaceholder: Enter the complete value to replace the target node with
json-node-edit.capitalizeFirstLetterDescription: Automatically convert the first letter of the node value to uppercase if it is lowercase.
json-node-edit.multiLangReplaceDescription: Replace the matched text with the corresponding language name based on the current node's language code (e.g., zh, en, ja). For example, content in the 'en' node will be replaced with 'English', while 'zh' will be replaced with 'Chinese'.

json-node-inserter.title: JSON Node Insertion - Fast Editing & Data Structure Optimization
json-node-inserter.description: Insert custom nodes in batches at specified positions within JSON data. Easily add nodes to array elements, edit JSON, and optimize your data structure to boost development efficiency. Note: Numeric-only key names will be automatically sorted to the front based on their numerical value.
json-node-inserter.keywords: JSON node insertion, JSON editing tool, data structure optimization, array node addition, batch insertion, development efficiency, data processing
json-node-inserter.clientDescription: This tool supports batch insertion of custom new nodes after a specified reference node within JSON data. Simply input the reference node name (to determine the insertion point) and the new node name(s) (multiple names allowed, separated by commas) to optimize your data structure and improve code execution efficiency. Note: Numeric-only key names will be automatically sorted in ascending order.
json-node-inserter.targetNodePlaceholder: Enter the reference node name (to determine insertion position)
json-node-inserter.newNodePlaceholder: Enter the new node name(s) (multiple names allowed, separated by commas)

json-sort-classify.title: JSON Sorting & Classification Tool
json-sort-classify.description: This tool efficiently sorts and classifies JSON arrays based on primary and secondary keys. It supports custom JSONPath expressions for precise, high-performance data management.
json-sort-classify.keywords: JSON sorting, JSON classification, JSON data processing, sorting tool, classification tool, JSON management, JSONPath, data management
json-sort-classify.clientDescription: This tool helps you reorganize JSON data based on specific rules, offering two core functionalities:  1. **Sorting Function:**    - **Purpose:** Arrange JSON data in a custom order.    - **How to Use:**      - Enter the desired sort order (one value per line) in the 'Sort Order' textbox; any values left blank will follow the default order.      - Enter the field name used for sorting (e.g., 'name').      - Click 'Sort JSON' to obtain the sorted data.  2. **Classification Function:**    - **Purpose:** Group and sort data based on primary and secondary keys.    - **How to Use:**      - Enter the field name for primary grouping (e.g., 'type') in 'Primary Key Field'.      - Enter the field name for secondary sorting (e.g., 'attribute') in 'Secondary Key Field'.      - Click 'Classify and Sort JSON' to complete the grouping and sorting process.
json-sort-classify.sortOrderTooltip: Enter the desired sort order, one value per line. Values left blank will follow the default order.
json-sort-classify.sortFieldTooltip: Enter the field name to be used for sorting
json-sort-classify.mainKeyTooltip: Enter the field name used for the first-level grouping
json-sort-classify.subKeyTooltip: Enter the field name used for sorting within groups
json-sort-classify.mainsubKeyMissing: Primary and secondary key field names cannot be empty
json-sort-classify.sortCustomMissing: For custom sorting, the sort order values cannot be empty
json-sort-classify.sortOrderMissing: Sort field name cannot be empty
json-sort-classify.sortError: An error occurred during sorting. Please check the sort order text or JSONPath expression.
json-sort-classify.classifyError: An error occurred during classification and sorting. Please check the JSON data and node names.

json-value-extractor.title: JSON Value Extraction Tool
json-value-extractor.description: Use the JSON Value Extraction Tool to easily extract and format node values from JSON data.
json-value-extractor.keywords: JSON value extraction, JSON processing, prefix, suffix, node extraction
json-value-extractor.clientDescription: Locate key-value pairs in JSON by key name or node path, extract their values, and add specified prefixes and suffixes. Example key names:
json-value-extractor.noNodeToExtract: Please add at least one extraction node or key name
json-value-extractor.nodeToExtractTooptip: Enter the key name or node path to extract

json-value-swapper.title: JSON Key-Value Swapper
json-value-swapper.description: A professional tool for swapping key values in JSON arrays. Quickly swap the values of specified keys in JSON array items.
json-value-swapper.keywords: JSON tool, key-value swap, JSON processing, data conversion, frontend tool, developer tool
json-value-swapper.clientDescription: Swap the values of specified keys in JSON array items with one click. Upload or paste your JSON data, choose two key names, and the tool will automatically swap their values in all array items. Note: This tool only supports first-level keys and does not support nested keys.
json-value-swapper.keysRequired: Please specify the two keys whose values need to be swapped
json-value-swapper.partialKeysFound: Some array items are missing the specified keys
json-value-swapper.missingKeysInItems: {count} items are missing the specified keys

json-value-transformer.title: JSON Key-Value Mapping Tool
json-value-transformer.description: A professional JSON key-value mapping tool that supports JSONPath queries, preset templates, and batch replacements. Easily perform complex JSON data structure transformations and value migrations.
json-value-transformer.keywords: JSON tool, key-value mapping, JSON processing, JSONPath, data transformation, frontend tool, developer tool, data migration
json-value-transformer.clientDescription: Efficiently handle JSON data mapping and transformation. Input a pair of keys (input and output keys) and the tool will locate the input key in the JSON data, replacing its value with that of the output key. It supports JSONPath syntax for precise data path targeting, offers preset templates (including multilingual translations), and enables complex value migrations across data structures. Custom mapping rules are supported, and nested structures are handled automatically to ensure data integrity and accuracy.

TranslationSettings.resetCacheTooltip: Clear all locally stored translation history (irreversible)
TranslationSettings.deeplxUrlExtra: Optional; leave empty to use default endpoint
TranslationSettings.modelExtra: The model name used for LLM translation. Refer to the API documentation for available models.
TranslationSettings.temperatureExtra: Temperature: Range 0 to 2. A higher temperature (e.g., 0.8) results in more randomness, while a lower temperature (e.g., 0.2) produces more focused and deterministic output.
TranslationSettings.systemPromptExtra: System prompt for LLM translation. Leave empty to revert to default.
TranslationSettings.userPromptExtra: Custom prompt for LLM translation. Leave empty to revert to default. Variables
TranslationSettings.chunkSizeExtra: For multi-line texts such as subtitles and Markdown, translations will be merged automatically.
TranslationSettings.limitExtra: Excessive rate may cause the API to return empty responses; please reduce the rate accordingly.

Metadata.title: Tools By AI Toolset - Multilingual Translation, Text Processing & JSON Editing | Essential for Efficient Development & Office Work
Metadata.description: Discover an all-in-one AI-driven toolset featuring subtitle translation, i18n JSON translation, Markdown text translation, text splitting, Chinese conversion, regex matching, JSON value extraction, node editing, key replacement, data match & update, bookmark parsing, and data conversion. Perfect for developers and creators handling multilingual translation and text processing tasks.
Metadata.keywords: Multilingual Translation, Text Processing, Subtitle Translation, JSON Editing, Markdown Translation, Text Splitting, Chinese Conversion, Regex Matching, JSON Value Extraction, Node Editing, Key Replacement, Data Match Update, Bookmark Parsing, Data Conversion
Metadata.homeDescription: An AI toolset featuring multilingual translation, text processing, JSON editing, and more to help developers and creators efficiently handle multilingual translation and text processing tasks.

CopyToClipboard.empty: Content is empty, nothing to copy
CopyToClipboard.unsupported: Current browser does not support clipboard operations. Please try copying manually or use a different browser

feedback.feedback2: If you encounter any issues during use or have any suggestions and ideas, feel free to let me know! Your feedback will directly influence the development and improvement of future features, helping us create a tool that better meets everyone's needs.
feedback.feedback3: Please describe your use case or the issue you encountered in detail, or share your creative ideas. I will carefully consider each piece of feedback and make adjustments and optimizations as soon as possible.
feedback.placeholder: Please leave a message, no login required (enter your email to receive reply notifications)
